I hate to be that guy asking that question.... is anyone else having an issue burning this? i use nero but it burns the file as a image file, not the actual movie. ive burnt tons of movies before but i am blanking on this. help?

@vinist2: try using Elbys CloneDVD2...there are detailed instructions on what to do if you want to compress it to a single layer dvd-r that i have wrote and contained in the link...o and i cant remember if i put instructions for putting it on a DL disc so if you do, here is what to do:
1. after installing the program open it up
2. click clone dvd
3.  browse (its the orange circle top right) to your Avatar folder (what you downloaded from this torrent)
4. select dvd -/+ DL from the middle bottom
5. next
6. select all the languages and subtitles that you want to preserve
7. next
8. make sure "dvd writer" is selected
9. volume label: Avatar
10. if you have more than 1 dvd writer, make sure the one you want to use is selected
11. check delete temp when done
12. go
13. Eject and enjoy!! :)

link for CloneDVD2: 
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5484190/Elby_s_CloneDVD2___keygen_[ctang]
